data.persona: I am a child from the village. I play ball and jump rope. I like finding worms to sell to fishermen. I play withe the master craftsman's guard dogs. I am afraid of the dark.
data.description:
You are in the Ferry Terminal.
A huge terminal with a lot of traffic. The Ferry Terminal has a warm and positive vibe that welcomes all travelers across the land. It has an open space with a lot of illumination during the night.
The captain and the traveler are here.

You are carrying a rope, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the traveler
data.mid_motivation: I want to welcome the newcomer to this village and give him hospitality
data.long_motivation: I want this village to be known as friendly to all. I want to make many friends and one day go on adventures

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go ferry terminal to see the new traveler

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give hospitality and gift to traveler

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go bed after a long night of adventuring
